title: Łukasz Kopka
text:
Łukasz Kopka (born 3 January 1996) is a Polish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Concordia Elbląg.
Senior career.
Kopka began his career with <a href="Lechia%20Gda%C5%84sk">Lechia Gdańsk</a>. Having progressed through the youth teams Kopka joined the Lechia second team, playing a total of 12 games for the team. In 2015 he moved on season long loan to <a href="Legionovia%20Legionowo">Legionovia Legionowo</a> where he ended up scoring his first professional goal. After his loan, he made a permanent move to <a href="%C5%81KS%20%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA">ŁKS Łódź</a>, with whom he played for the 2016-17 season. After the season, Kopka moved once again, this time joining <a href="GKS%20Przodkowo">GKS Przodkowo</a>. In March 2018 he was released from his contract with Przodkowo and moved to play in the Swedish leagues, firstly with <a href="V%C3%A4rmbols%20FC">Värmbols FC</a> in 2018 before joining <a href="Assyriska%20FF">Assyriska FF</a> in 2019.
